function colorLuminance(hex, lum) {
  // validate hex string
  hex = String(hex).replace(/[^0-9a-f]/gi, '');

  if (hex.length < 6) {
    hex = hex[0] + hex[0] + hex[1] + hex[1] + hex[2] + hex[2];
  }

  lum = lum || 0; // convert to decimal and change luminosity

  var rgb = '#',
      c,
      i;

  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
    c = parseInt(hex.substr(i * 2, 2), 16);
    c = Math.round(Math.min(Math.max(0, c + c * lum), 255)).toString(16);
    rgb += ('00' + c).substr(c.length);
  }

  return rgb;
}

function hexToRgb(hex) {
  var result = void 0;

  if (hex.match(/^#.{3}$/)) {
    result = /^#?([a-f\d])([a-f\d])([a-f\d])$/i.exec(hex);
    result[1] += result[1];
    result[2] += result[2];
    result[3] += result[3];
  } else {
    result = /^#?([a-f\d]{2})([a-f\d]{2})([a-f\d]{2})$/i.exec(hex);
  }

  return result ? {
    r: parseInt(result[1], 16),
    g: parseInt(result[2], 16),
    b: parseInt(result[3], 16)
  } : null;
}

function transparentize(color, amount) {
  var c = hexToRgb(color);
  return 'rgba(' + c.r + ', ' + c.g + ', ' + c.b + ', ' + Math.round((1 - amount) * 1000) / 1000 + ')';
}

function darkenColor(color, percent) {
  return colorLuminance(color, -percent);
}

function ligthenColor(color) {
  return color;
}

function isDarkColor(color) {
  var c = convertColor(color).substring(1); // strip #

  var rgb = parseInt(c, 16); // convert rrggbb to decimal

  var r = rgb >> 16 & 0xff; // extract red

  var g = rgb >> 8 & 0xff; // extract green

  var b = rgb >> 0 & 0xff; // extract blue

  var luma = 0.2126 * r + 0.7152 * g + 0.0722 * b; // per ITU-R BT.709

  return luma < 40;
}
